short_summary: Klas Voyager Products or equivalentThe purpose of this document is to define the scope of the requirement for a bespoke secure remote access solution across the range of networks utilized by the Privy Council Office (PCO) and for communications equipment classified at up to the secret level related to business continuity.
description: Bid Responses must be sent via P2PClosing March 08, 2024 @ 3:00 PMAmendment 002 - P2P adjustment onlyBidder/s that have already submitted their Bid Response must be re-submitted on the latest P2P amendment to be accepted.
full_summary:
=========

**Government Tender Announcement**

**Title:** Klas Voyager Products or Equivalent

**Reference Number:** SSC-24-00025769:T

**Solicitation Number:** BPM020954/25769

**Publication Date:** February 26, 2024

**Closing Date:** March 08, 2024 @ 3:00 PM EST

**Amendment Number:** 2

This government tender announcement invites bids for the supply of Klas Voyager Products or equivalent, which comprise a bespoke secure remote access solution for the Privy Council Office (PCO) and communications equipment classified up to the secret level related to business continuity.

**Scope of Requirements:**
-------------------------

The tender is seeking to procure a secure remote access solution that meets the specific needs of the PCO, which includes multiple networks and communications equipment classified up to the secret level.

**Bid Instructions:**
------------------

Bid responses must be submitted electronically via the Government of Canada's Procurement and Supply Chain webpage. Closing date for bids is March 08, 2024 @ 3:00 PM EST. Bidders who have already submitted their bid must re-submit it to the latest version to be accepted.

**Trade Agreements:**
------------------

This tender is open to bidders from Canada, as well as countries with which Canada has a trade agreement, including:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

**Contact Information:**
----------------------

For more information, please contact Oliver Librada, contracting authority, at Oliver.librada@ssc-spc.gc.ca.

**Attachments:**
----------------

Please find the relevant attachments below:

* [Link 1]
* [Link 2]
* [Link 3]
* [Link 4]
* [Link 5]
* [Link 6]
